Package org.apache.nutch.indexer

Index content, configure and run indexing and cleaning jobs to add, update, and delete documents from an index.

Package org.apache.nutch.indexer Description

Index content, configure and run indexing and cleaning jobs to add, update, and delete documents from an index. Two tasks are delegated to plugins:
  • indexing filters fill index fields of each documents
  • index writer plugins send documents to index back-ends (Solr, etc.).
